description: Francesco D'Macho and Damien Crosse are two of the hottest men inthe world (and they just got married!). Damien is frisky andunpredictable while Francesco is the ultimate gentleman with a dirtystreak. These two have been together for a year but the chemistry isunmistakable. Damien fucks like a rock star, hard and aggressive.When they flip, Francesco fucks Damien with equal enthusiasm.These boys cum with love in their eyes.
title: Porn Stars In Love, Scene #01
